title: Farms of the future | The importance of #sustainable #farming practices

tasks.task: Analyze future farm automation and technology trends.
subtasks: Evaluate the role of autonomous robots in precision farming.
Assess how lasers on tractors detect weeds for targeted treatment.
Familiarize with the Ladybird Rover, a solar-powered autonomous agricultural rover.
Examine the potential of drones in farm operations, including crop surveillance and seed sowing.
Understand the use of multi and hyperspectral cameras for crop health monitoring.
Explore the integration of smartphones and apps in collecting agricultural data.
Discuss the Internet of Things (IoT) applications in connected farm equipment.
Consider innovative farm locations such as underground farming and factory integration.
Investigate large-scale agricultural research platforms like the Northwick Farm Platform and Scanalyzer.
Understand the role of BBSRC-funded research in global food security amidst climate change.

tasks.task: Summarize the key benefits and trends in future farming technology.
subtasks: Identify cost-effective solutions for developing countries.
Highlight the importance of real-time data analysis and shared cloud services.
Emphasize the multisensory approaches to detect crop issues beyond human perception.
Acknowledge the potential of integrated farming systems with local energy sources.
